qas.question: An actor watches a toy go into a green box, then leaves. While she is gone, the toy is moved to a yellow box. When she returns, which box will she open first?
A girl watches a toy go into a blue box, then leaves. While she is gone, the toy is moved to a red box. When she returns, which box will she open first?
A boy sees a cookie go into a tin, then leaves. It is moved to a jar. When he comes back, which container will he open first?
A mom sees a book go into a bag, then steps out. It is moved to a drawer. When she returns, which place will she check first?
A child sees a ball go into a bucket, then leaves. It is moved to a basket. When the child returns, which will be opened first?
A teacher sees a pencil go into a cup, then leaves. It is moved to a box. When she returns, which container will she open first?
A kid sees a marble go into a green bowl, then leaves. It is moved to a yellow bowl. When the kid returns, which bowl will be opened first?
A dad sees a toy go into a backpack, then leaves. It is moved to a drawer. When he returns, where will he look first?
A sister sees a ring go into a purse, then leaves. It is moved to a box. When she returns, which will she open first?
A boy sees a toy go into a chest, then leaves. It is moved to a shelf. When he returns, which place will he check first?
A girl sees a snack go into a drawer, then leaves. It is moved to a cabinet. When she returns, which will she open first?
